short_description: korner marus is an oil & gas - extraction & distribution company based in filderstadt, germany.
long_description: wir fertigen schwimmerschalter für die messung des füllstands von allen mit flüssigkeiten im bereich von zentralen schmierstoffsystemen, hydraulischen anlagen und für andere mit flüssigkeitsbehältern ausgestatteten geräten. neben diesen standardprodukten bieten wir auch eine auftragsfertigung für elektronische komponenten an. körner marus gmbh: kann auf über 60 jahre unternehmensgeschichte zurückblicken.
generated_description: körner-marus gmbh is a german company that specializes in providing lubricant dispensing solutions. they manufacture swimmers for measuring the level of liquid in central lubricant systems, hydraulic systems, and other devices equipped with liquid containers. the company offers a range of products, including kolbenverteiler, which use speed-regulated pressurized air to distribute lubricants in the correct quantity to one or more lubricant plants. they also manufacture pumps of various construction methods for larger lubricant mixtures. in addition to their standard products, körner marus gmbh offers custom manufacturing services for electronic components.
generated_business_tags: modern pump fluid equipment | quick-regulating pressure air | liquid nitrogen manufacturer | water pumps manufacturer | measurement devices for swimming pools | central nitrogen systems | hydraulics | electronic component manufacturing
